As a Scrum Master you are focused on leading your teams, and this course will help take you to the next step by providing instruction on how to facilitate communication and interaction across multiple teams as they work in unison to support and encourage program goals. Trainers will show you how to improve your current Scrum mindset by introducing you to the concept of scalable engineering and the practices of DevOps.
